title: PyTorch+HIP AMD GPU?!
body_html:
Hi there,
Currently I'm running a program that uses pytorch on a machine with Nvidia GPU with cuda
I'd like to move it to a computer that has AMD GPU

noticed that you have support for HIP, which should allow me to do this, as I understand
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/tree/382ff032224a14eecee476c564615204bcab4beb/tools/amd_build
https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/HIP

So how do I do this?
Should I just change something while I'm installing pytorch? or after installation?
Do I need to run some tool from HIP?
I've read it should be fairly simple, but I havn't found a way to do this
any suggestions?

Thank you very much 😄
Tami
